metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23961 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Further techniques that built on the slipstream research combined with amalicious webpage could have exposed both an internal network's hosts aswell as services running on the user's local machine. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 85.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
